ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: Might ve been a glitch or lag. I ve had creatures that conned indifferent to me when I was NOT invis suddenly run up and attack me for no reason before. All
ygData.messageBody:
Might've been a glitch or lag.
I've had creatures that conned indifferent to me when I was NOT invis
suddenly run up and attack me for no reason before. All sorts of weird
things happen sometimes.
luv,
-Su

> With bard invis, it goes off every tick.. so you click it off for a sec
to hail the spirit then next tick, it's back on you. I was actually just
sitting there, WITh invis on, when the shark attacked. SO, I'm guessing
that they can see through regular invis, but Invis vs animals they cannot
see through, although this makes no sense =D
>
> Orion wrote:That one is very long and boring but I did learn that there
actually is a use for that Invis to Animals spell we get. Use it and you can
talk to the spirits without dropping invis and the sharks,etc will just go
right by...:> ----- Original Message ----- From: Toni To:
EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, September 11, 2002 11:51
AMSubject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
>
> Very cool... I have alot of work on my epic to do still... although I do
have a few pieces of it. Went to a raid in CoM a few weeks ago & got the
drops off of lord ghiosk =D I still have to do the test's of wisdom,
patience, and might. Tried the test of patience with my BF's bard (using
enduring breath, and Bard invis...) Got through the first 3 spawns, and got
attacked by a killer shark =/ so I have not gone back yet.. need to do it
soon.(another reason I have not gone back, is I have been playing my cleric
alot =D)
>
> Orion wrote: Thats the one...:> Been 4 levels since then and I am old and
forgetful...hehehe Yep....Ogre Shaman ----- Original Message ----- From:
Toni To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, September 11, 2002 10:44
AMSubject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
>
> Black wolf skin?? or do you mean Black Dire pelt??? If so, that would
make you a Shammy<GRIN> Shammy's ROCK =D
> My guild leader got back at Equestrialle the corrupted this Sunday
afternoon, We also took down Priestess Llandra. <GRIN> But I haven't seen t
he corrupted brownie yet.
> Katashaka Naboombu
> 47 Vah Shir Shaman
> Proud officer of Claws of night
> Vazaelle
> Gwenevieve (soon to be Hartripper)
> 30 High Elf Cleric of Tunare
> Proud officer of Claws of Night
> Vazaelle
> Orion wrote: We got revenge....some of our guildies joined us and we
hunted him..got a piece for one of the guildmates for her epic. Then went on
into Mistmoore and got the Black Wolf Skin for my epic(what we were after in
the first place)Revenge is sweet...hehehe ----- Original Message ----- From:
Su To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday, September 10, 2002 11:38
PMSubject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
> I hate brownies..
> When I first started playing EverQuest and decided to venture out without
my
> sister's help, I went over to the spires in Gfay. I saw this cute tiny
> person standing there. It said brownie scout over it's head. I was like
"How
> cute! Hello little guy" and walked over to greet it. It started casting a
> spell but I was so new I didn't know what it was doing. Next thing I know
I
> see LOADING PLEASE WAIT.
> That was the first time I died in the game.
> One day, I will have my revenge.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> At level 48 the corrupted Brownie killed me and my wife(level 49 warrior).
> LFay is a tricky dangerous place.
>
>
